message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $11500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $12250? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.

Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll make a new offer of $11750. I hope we can come to an agreement.
